text: The 2006-2007 UCI Oceania Tour is the third season of the UCI Oceania Tour of professional road bicycle racing held in various countries throughout the Oceania region. The season begins with the Jayco Herald Sun Tour stage race in October 2006 and runs until September 2007. The points leader, based on the cumulative results of previous races, wears the UCI Oceania Tour cycling jersey. The final points leader is crowned the 2006-2007 UCI Oceania Tour champion. Gordon McCauley is the 2005-2006 champion of the UCI Oceania Tour. == Events == The UCI Oceania Tour consists of the following one-day races and stage races: === October 2006 === Race Winner Team 8.-14. Jayco Herald Sun Tour Simon Gerrans Australia 21\. Melbourne to Warrnambool Cycling Classic Robert McLachlan Drapac Porsche === November 2006 === Race Winner Team 6.-11. PowerNet Tour of Southland Hayden Roulston Health Net-Maxxis === January 2007 === Race Winner Team 17.-21. Tour Down Under Martin Elmiger ag2r Prévoyance 24.-28. Trust House Tour of Wellington Hayden Roulston Trek-Zookeepers Cafe === May 2007 === Race Winner Team 3\. Oceanic Time Trials Championsionships Cameron Wurf Australia 5\. Oceanic Road Championsionships Robert McLachlan Australia === June 2007 === Race Winner Team 29\. B-World Time Trials Championsionships Hai Jun Ma People's Republic of China === July 2007 === Race Winner Team 1\. B-World Road Championsionships Ivan Stević Serbia === September 2007=== Race Winner Team 26\. 2007 Time Trial Road World Championships U23 27\. 2007 Time Trial World Championships 29\. 2007 Road World Championships U23 30\. 2007 Road World Championships == Point standings == (As of : 25 June 2007) {| class="prettytable" Rank Ride Nation Points 1\.
